backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor representing a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented Valentine UI features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of key frontend files including App.tsx, hooks, global styles, and index.html.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining color palettes and layout tokens for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React script and setting the Valentine-themed page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling the Valentine prompt, evasive No button behavior, and celebratory meme view after Yes is clicked.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook that computes and updates random safe positions for the No button when hovered or touched.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles including extended romantic color variables and utility classes for the Valentine theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind theme, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, features, requirements, and pending requests for a Valentine-themed interactive webpage.
